title: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets out to become the Pirate King by finding the legendary treasure known as the One Piece.
author: Eiichiro Oda

title: Solo Leveling
description: In a world where hunters fight monsters for survival, Sung Jinwoo, the weakest hunter, gains a mysterious system that helps him grow stronger.
author: Chugong

title: Kaiju No. 8
description: Kafka Hibino gains the ability to transform into a Kaiju, giving him a chance to fulfill his dream of fighting monsters as part of the Defense Force.
author: Naoya Matsumoto

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister Nezuko, who was turned into a demon.
author: Koyoharu Gotouge

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Yuji Itadori joins Tokyo Jujutsu High to fight curses and protect humanity from supernatural evil.
author: Gege Akutami

title: Black Clover
description: Asta and Yuno, two orphans in a world ruled by magic, compete to become the Wizard King.
author: YÅ«ki Tabata

title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
description: Boruto Uzumaki, son of the Seventh Hokage Naruto, strives to carve his own path as a ninja.
author: Masashi Kishimoto

title: One Punch Man
description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, searches for meaning in his overwhelming power.
author: ONE
